name: CommunityConnect
0:
”Alexa, open Community Connect”
”Alexa, ask Community Connect about projects in my area”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: community connect
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Active and engaged citizens expect accurate and current information about community events and initiatives run by their city. Community Connect extends your city's community engagement platform to Alexa-enabled devices.

Easily stay connected and involved in the development of your community. Want to know what's happening? You can say, 'Alexa, ask Community Connect about projects in my area."

Is your town naming a new park? Is your city looking for feedback on a new construction project? You'll have an opportunity to hear about different projects and give your feedback, share your ideas. 

Community Connect works with Engagement HQ, by Bang the Table. New cities are being added everyday.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
